## Data Pre-processing

```{r}
library(dplyr)

data <- USArrests %>% 
  mutate(State = rownames(.)) %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(-State), scale)

head(data)
```
## Clustering

```{r}
# calculate distance matrix
dist_data <- dist(x = data[,-5], method = "euclidean")
```

```{r}
# build tree
tree_data <- hclust(d = dist_data, method = "average")
plot(tree_data, labels = data$State)
```
```{r}
plot(tree_data, labels = data$State)
```
